column4: hi all.  sorry to bother.  can anyone confirm using skype with video successfully in ubuntu?
I believe the newest beta of skype has video support, but I do not know how well it works.  This is not in the repositories.
where can i get some help on multiple monitors on laptop?  is there a laptop specific chan? --> sorry, this is first time i've properly install ubuntu and decided to stick with it
I really don't know enough about multiple monters to help you, sorry.
